    • About Greg Harrelson


    Greg Harrelson has helped more people buy or sell in the Myrtle Beach market than any other agent in the past 15 years. To accomplish this, Greg Harrelson has dedicated himself to hard work and a relentless pursuit to being the most knowledgeable agent in the market and tops in the country.

    Greg is a former coach for The Mike Ferry Organization and has helped many agents reach top producer status selling 100, 200 and more homes per year.

    One of the Gregâs greatest accomplishments is being #1 in the country for Highest Production Per Agent in the country. In order to achieve this, Greg had to commit his time and effort to developing real estate agents within his organization. He is known to be the go-to coach for high production results.

    He has created a productive environment that allows agents to grow their business fast and in a sustainable manner while maintaining a positive team-like culture within the organization.
